AD_Plaque.synopsis: This is a plaque placed in the section of barracks and dining halls and altar in Shar temple. Wise words to acolytes to have priestine thoughts and behavior

automatic_ordering.reasoning: There is only one session available ('AD_Plaque') and no other sessions to link it with in an ordering hierarchy. Since no causal or consequence-based relationships can be established with a single session, there are no ordering or mutual exclusiveness constraints.

AD_Plaque_0.text: *Feed your bodies and rest your minds. Lady Shar needs her warriors strong and ready.*
